Instruction: Cook lentils according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, and celery. Cook until softened.
Add garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, oregano, and a pinch of salt. Cook for 30 seconds.
Stir in lentils, vegetable broth, tomato paste, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Peel and cube potatoes. Boil potatoes until tender. Drain and mash with vegan butter, plant-based milk, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper.
Transfer lentil mixture to a baking dish. Top with mashed potatoes.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until golden brown and bubbly.
